property.value: Action: Choose up to 3 SPELL or ARTIFACT cards in your discard pile. Until the end of the phase, you may play those cards as though you were playing them from your hand. If any of the chosen cards are event cards, put them on the bottom of your deck instead of your discard pile after playing them.

property.value: Disaster. Madness.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Response: After a character goes insane, its controller discards 2 cards at random from his hand. Then, for each event or support card thus discarded, you may place 1 success token on a story.

property.value: Forced Response: After you play this card, destroy all DAY cards in play. Response: After an opponent plays a card from his hand, he must discard the top card of his deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Action: Exhaust, pay 3 and sacrifice Dimensional Rift to destroy all characters and support cards in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Resolve the effects of all other non-conspiracy story cards in play.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player names a character or support card. All copies of the named cards are sacrificed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player draws until he has 8 cards in hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player chooses a domain and attaches his hand to that domain as resources.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player chooses one resource attached to each of his domains. All other resources are destroyed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard all success tokens from all story cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player sacrifices all of his characters.

card.name: The Secret of the North Woods

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player puts into play all characters in his discard pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: After you win the story, choose DAY or NIGHT. Each player searches his deck for a card with that keyword, puts that card into play, then shuffles his deck.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Each player chooses one story card which he has won (except this one) and shuffles it into the story deck. Then destroy all DAY and NIGHT cards in play.
